name: hugo_site
description: This is the repository from which the [Hugo](https://gohugo.io)-generated version of [www.brycewray.com](https://www.brycewray.com/) is built.

scripts.startsass: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean devsass --parallel dev:hugo devsass:*
scripts.testbuildsass: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean prodsass --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:sass
scripts.testbuildpfsass: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all buildsass pagefind --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:sass
scripts.startnew: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean cleannew postcsscli --parallel dev:hugo dev:postcss
scripts.buildnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean cleannew postcsscli prod:hugo
scripts.testbuildnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean cleannew --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:postcss
scripts.testbuildpfnew: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all buildnew pagefind --parallel testbuild:hugo testbuild:postcss

author: Bryce Wray
